job_title: Unit Manager (Area Sales Manager / Distributor Manager)
job_description: Roles & Responsibilities:Unit Manager will report directly to Regional Sales Manager. He/She will be responsible for managing, monitoring, and controlling sales performances and activities of assigned concessionaire in order to ensure the achievement of sales target.Preferred candidates are expected to be:Committed to respect specific rules to comply with the WHO Code of Breast Milk Substitutes and any related regulations applying locallyBeing accountable and responsible for safetyGraduated in Business Administration or any related field, with over 3 years’ work experiences of traditional trade channel in FMCG BusinessPossess good command of English both spoken and writtenPossess good presentation, interpersonal and communication skillsHave strong knowledge in shopper understanding, in-store execution & controlling, and customer partnership developmentBe firm on own work principles and able to manage expectationsOnly short-listed will be notified. Attractive remuneration package will be offered to the successful candidate. Interested candidates should send in their applications, stating in full, qualifications and experience, as well as current and expected remuneration, and a recent photograph to:Human Resources DepartmentDUMEX LIMITEDUnit 801, 8th floor, Abdulrahim Place,990 Rama IV Road, Silom, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500Tel: 0-2740-3300 Fax: 0-2740-3499

Job descriptionReporting to the Senior Category Manager in the local marketplace team, the Associate Category Manager will be responsible for the planning and execution to grow the Fashion subcategory. Key focus areas include:Performance strategy & execution: develop subcategory strategy based on various data points, derive action plans and execute with team members to monitor and improve key performance indicatorsAssortment planning & merchandising: develop category knowledge in terms of assortment, styles and price points to understand the gaps and match demand and supply in the marketSellers management: manage relationships with the seller communities with a particular focus on top sellers, acting as a business advisor to ensure their sustainable growth and contribution to the subcategory, as well as working closely with the vendor acquisition team to acquire and groom new sellers to grow strategic assortment within the subcategoryMarketing & onsite management: working closely with cross-functional teams including traffic and marketing teams to plan for campaigns as per the identified assortment and growth direction of the subcategory and manage onsite merchandising and deal hunting from the sellers RequirementBachelor’s Degree or above At least 3-5 years of experience in retail (offline or online), business development, or market researchStrong analytical skills with systematic and structured thinking Excellent negotiation and problem-solving skills Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic cross-functional environment Good verbal and written communication skills both English and Thai

job_responsibilities: ['Daily management:Manage day to day operation to achieve E-Commerce sales target.Monitor and submit daily and monthly report in order to present the activity grid together with e-commerce sales & KPIs.Always ensure a seamless and positive customer and user experience of all 3 accounts (SEIKO, ALBA and CLOCKS) especially Chat response which need to response within 15 minutes.Product:Support key product launches, specifically SKU set up and product detail page content to drive business results.Responsible for tracking and timely delivery of new SKUs to meet required launch dates (includes content, specs, attributes, etc.).Manage stock allocation to reach planned targets and minimize out of stock.Work closely with product team to ensures accurate product information and attributes to ensure most ideal customer experience.Seller center:Monitors mechanics and utilize tools on online platforms both LAZADA and JD seller center.Tracks and monitors online customer comments and creates/implements action plans in response.Feedback any platform related issues to E-commerce Manager and create temporary fixes until these are resolved.Others:Work with cross-functional teams and external partners to continually create engaging user experiences and sales opportunities.Communicate to warehouses any special requirements in relation to offers as necessary.Other duties as assigned.']

job_description: Daily management:Manage day to day operation to achieve E-Commerce sales target.Monitor and submit daily and monthly report in order to present the activity grid together with e-commerce sales & KPIs.Always ensure a seamless and positive customer and user experience of all 3 accounts (SEIKO, ALBA and CLOCKS) especially Chat response which need to response within 15 minutes.Product:Support key product launches, specifically SKU set up and product detail page content to drive business results.Responsible for tracking and timely delivery of new SKUs to meet required launch dates (includes content, specs, attributes, etc.).Manage stock allocation to reach planned targets and minimize out of stock.Work closely with product team to ensures accurate product information and attributes to ensure most ideal customer experience.Seller center:Monitors mechanics and utilize tools on online platforms both LAZADA and JD seller center.Tracks and monitors online customer comments and creates/implements action plans in response.Feedback any platform related issues to E-commerce Manager and create temporary fixes until these are resolved.Others:Work with cross-functional teams and external partners to continually create engaging user experiences and sales opportunities.Communicate to warehouses any special requirements in relation to offers as necessary.Other duties as assigned.Qualification:Age: under 30 years.Bachelor’s degree in Business / Marketing or equivalent.At least 2 years experiences in Sales and Marketing.Experience in e-commerce platform is a plus.Good analytical and organizational skills.Ability to collaborate well with others as well as to work individually.Ability to multi-task.Advanced computer skills in Word, Excel and PowerPoint.Can do attitude.SEIKO (THAILAND) CO., LTD. Our client is aleading manufacturer in its field with operations worldwide. They are now looking for aSales Director to join their organization. The successful candidate will drive growth & increase brand equity. They will manage the distribution growth and channel development. Analyze market trends and competitor activities and strengthen sales force development. Responsibilities:In collaboration with HR this candidate will develop the sales force to become strong consultants with the focus on the right balance of sell-in/sell-out activities.Operate & motivate, develop, supervise and coach subordinates on tasks; share/advice on problem-solving solution; monitor/evaluate performance; evaluate, review and propose subordinate performance evaluation, promotion, recognition and competency assessments in order to ensure high-performance team oriented, dedicate workforce, and meet organizational capabilitiesCoach and mentor team membersComplete performance and development reviews/appraisals of, and planning for, team members per HR processes.Hold regular meetings, both formal and informal, with team members.Lead the integration of multiple sales teams. Joint planning sessions with units involved in driving the business.Consolidates and executes Sales annual operation plan.Regularly tracks the performance of Sales, gross profit per brand, channel, and customerCoordinates with Supply Chain and Marketing to provide accurate forecast and ensure adequate supply capabilityDevelops the distribution strategy and ensures execution of business targets, monitors distribution, channel penetration and business growth through distribution optimization. Evaluate the effectiveness of strategic and tactical sales activities in order to meet market demands. Collaborates and influences Marketing and Pricing to implement and control pricing policyRequirementsMaster Degree in business or a related field10 years professional experience in Sales with above 3 years in Management level (prefer Automotive and/or After Market Supplier Industry)Direct experience in leading large sales teamDirect experience in Tire business is a plusExcellent command of written and spoken English and ThaiStrategic sales planning and analysisStrong leadership with team development skills

Job descriptionManage and drive the Vendor Acquisition team Main objective is to convince Thailand traders, sellers and distributors to join Lazada and list their products to sell on our platformBreak down targets into individual targets for each team member and ensure targets are achievedDefine and develop team’s KPIs Liaises with category team to drive and grow the categories based on current strategy (e.g. Electronics, Health & Beauty, Fashion, Lifestyle etc.) and identify assortment gaps and vendors to fill these gapsTracks employees' performance and conduct individual evaluation Manage employees' incentives scheme RequirementVery commercial driven and strong interest for business development At least 5+ years of work experience in sales or business development Leadership experience and strong desire to build and lead own team Demonstrated ability to manage, prioritize and deliver on multiple projects Strongly motivated to succeed and achieve targets Humble, proactive, self-driven, leads by example e-commerce experience is a plus Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both English and Thai

job_description: Position Description and Roles & Responsibilities:The ROLE would be responsible for developing, planning and executing short to mid-term sales strategies and achieving all objectives including Net Sales, Trade and Delivered Margin for all brands under General Mills.Key responsibilities (not exhaustive) for the position are:Meet/Exceed key financial objectives including Net Sales, Trade, and Delivered Margin for assigned channelPlan and execute flawlessly nation-wide and ad-hoc key account promotion, NPD launch and other in-store promotion necessary to achieve sales objectives and target. Partner with National Sales Manager to plan and negotiate annual trading terms discussion, effectively balancing customer and GMI interest to drive mutually beneficial outcomes. Effective management of trade spend, and overall profitability of key customers.Utilize sales analytics to identify opportunities for growth and to drive profitable bottom line.Build strong partnerships with key customers. Provide accurate and timely information for decision makingConduct regular business reviews with key retailerMeet assigned merchandising standards ensuring stock weight, coverage, distribution, shelving, freezer performance meets expectations. Update the National Sales Manager on the movement or work progress by weekly and monthly report.Experience & Qualification:Bachelor’s Degree in related field.Proven track record of developing sales and strong customer relationships as well as developing and implementing trade initiativesFull understanding of respective retail market environment – Traditional Trade, Modern Trade, CVS and B2BStrong influencing skillsStrong negotiation and presentation skillsIdeal candidate should have 5 years of professional experienceIntelligent, achievement oriented, self-motivated, pleasant personality with the desire to learn and growFluency in Thai and English – both written and spoken

Our client is a multi-national company and a well-known brand. They are now looking for a talented 'Travel Retail Manager' who has experience in travel retail sales or business. This role will develop and responsible for the overall direction of the stores in Airport locations Key Responsibilities:· Develop a joint-business plan and strategy with trade partners. · Review sales performance with trade partners regularly and identify opportunities. · In charge of developing strong working relationships with internal departments to establish synergy and best practices among retail and trade. · Oversee the new store opening process from planning to execution.· Review and enhance merchandise stock levels and assortments. · Arrange BA/Supervisor's working schedule and inform the team accordingly.· Check and assist to improve BA's sales knowledge and attitude, including education on new products and sales skills to maximize BA's sales competency · Gather insightful competition, trends, market intelligence for network planning Requirements:· At least 5 years' experience in travel retail sales or business development. · Travel Retail regional or global exposure is highly preferred. · Good understanding of luxury retail/retail ops knowledge experience. · English speaking is a must. · A successful sales track record,· Good at managing and building relationships· *THAI NATIONAL ONLY* If this opportunity is of interest to you, please feel free to apply via email: [emailprotected] for more details or call to Pong at 02-107-2872Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

job_responsibilities: ["Location : BangkokJob summary :-Providing business and technical solutions to customer needs. Major responsibility on HVAC installation system. Expert on project Management and cost control. They have to work with TRANE existing staff to continue contracting business. Responsible for customer satisfaction and loyalty while working in conjunction with operations partners. Builds and manages term customer relationships/partnerships with assigned accounts.HVAC control systems engineers work exclusively on a building's heating, cooling, ventilation, and refrigeration control systems. HVAC control systems are usually computerized and networked throughout a facility into a central command point. The HVAC control systems engineer designs, implements, modifies and maintains the control system. He or she may work directly with customers to develop new or replacement HVAC control systems, troubleshoot problems, advise on repairs, or train customers on how to use their HVAC system controls."]

HVAC control systems are usually computerized and networked throughout a facility into a central command point. The HVAC control systems engineer designs, implements, modifies and maintains the control system. He or she may work directly with customers to develop new or replacement HVAC control systems, troubleshoot problems, advise on repairs, or train customers on how to use their HVAC system controls.Qualification :-Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical industrial or Equal/ Electrical Engineering or any related field2-5 years of experience in Air conditioning business, Contracting field or successfully selling HVAC or building automation system industry.Specialist in Air conditioning background, HVAC System , Installation are preferableGood command of English communicationGood personality and communicationActive personality with the analytical mind, positive thinking, pleasant personality, teamwork, service minded ,continuous self- improvement and effective in time management Excellent in computer (MS-Office, presentation & spreadsheet software , Auto cad) and presentation skill are requiredPossess a car with valid license & willing travelHow to applyClick APPLY NOW for submit your applicationCareer paths filled with the best welfare benefit and professional training await the successful applicants, so, come and join us now !!! Interest candidates are invited to write in with full resume, stating your present and expected salary to address or E-mail below :Human Resources DepartmentTrane Thailand30th-31st Floor, Vanit Building II 1126/2 New Petchburi Road,Makkasan, Rachthevee, Bangkok 10400, ThailandTel : 662 761 1111 ext. 8903Website :tranethailand.com

job_title: Sport Leader at Decathlon Pattaya (Fresh graduate and internship are welcome)
job_responsibilities: ['Company descriptionDecathlon is one of the biggest sporting goods designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in France, with a big global presence and many sports under one roof. We are very excited to welcome you to our stores in Thailand.Job descriptionOur Sport Leaders are responsible for customer service and sales, department profitability as well as building and coaching teams within their department. You’ll be making decisions for the business from day one by analyzing and planning your commercial activity, forming new ways to boost your sport’s range of products for your local customers and engaging your sports users through the organization of events in and out of the store. Your determination coupled with our training will teach you the fundamentals of how to grow your market share for your favourite sport. You are encouraged to think outside the box and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit.Your responsibilitiesTeam Player - The business and the customer always comes first, together with your colleagues you will ensure that your in-store business is commercial and efficient day by day .Digital - As the retail continues to evolve, you will have the freedom to discover new ways to build your brand through social media and other digital channels.Partnerships - Once your business is thriving in store and online, you can reach out into your community and work with your local sport clubs/schools/businesses to develop partnerships. Here is where you will apply your networking skills in order to strengthen your brand and to make your sport accessible within your community.Customer Service - Your customers will always be your number one priority, you will have the means to listen to their feedback in order to make improvements to your business. At Decathlon we ensure that all our customers remain loyal through our Satisfied or Satisfied policy.Sport business - You will build the best product offering for your customer. You will choose all of your ranges within your sport, adapting your business to the current market. You will organise events in your local area to increase brand awareness and customer participation in sport.']
job_qualifications: ["s• Passionate about sports and excited by your potential to drive impact change in people• Positive, hands-on attitude with a desire to learn• Embrace responsibility and vitality• Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment• Great listener, communicator, and team player• Strong leadership qualities, previous experience in management is a plus• Experience with social media campaigns and data analytics• Basic knowledge of Office and Google Suite is necessary• Flexible schedule and availability on weekends is a mustAdditional information• Competitive salary• Health insurance• Performance bonus• Provident fund• Generous employee discount• A learning environment where you can dive deep and make an impact• Be a shareholder, with an exclusive annual option to invest in Decathlon’s Shares• Wide range of career opportunities locally and globallyWE ARE LOOKING FOR PASSIONATE SPORT LOVERS. IF YOU LOVE ANY OF THESE SPORTS, LET'S JOIN US!Body Building Fitness Cadio Cross training CampingHiking Trekking Walking Wildlife observation More informationhttps://bethechange.decathlon.com "]

job_title: Customer Service Representative - MNC Speciality Chemicals Firm
job_description: The client is looking a potential candidate to join them on for Customer Service Representative position. This person is to perform order administration duties and ensure that customer order requests are processed on a timely and efficient basis. This position will be responsible for supporting Thailand market focus on chemical industry product. Client DetailsThe client is the one of the largest speciality chemicals companies in the world, selling various type of products such as plastics, polymer, coating, etc. They are around the globe, locate in more than 100 countries. As the market leader, they concentrate on high-growth megatrends, especially health, nutrition, resource efficiency and globalization. DescriptionHandle all documentation jobs and responsible for complete order to cash process.Communicate with supplier, freight forwarder, customer and the third-party warehouse.Manage incoming and outgoing stock at warehouse and maintain sufficient stock holding based on forecast from sales/customersProceed customer orders, shipping document, invoice and other related documents by using SAP systemCo-operate and work closely with sales team to provide sales support functions to customersManage for customer requirement with proper manner and timely basis.Coordinate with colleagues from headquarters, sales & marketing, accounts receivables, and other related departments to follow up on credit and logistics matters for daily operation with clear communication.Work on customer complaints  ProfileBachelor's degree in management, chemical or any related field.At least 3 years of work experience in an MNC environment.Experience with logistics and shipping (import & export) process and documentation (Credit, Bill of Lading, Airway Bill, Export Letter, etc.)Experience in processing ASIA import shipments is preferred.Experience in using SAP system and MS Office is an advantageGreat team player, able to work independently with under pressureGood problem-solving skill, proactive, and positive attitude with a high responsibilityFluency in spoken and written English  Job OfferCompetitive Based SalaryBonusOther allowances and benefitsGreat career opportunity  To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. job_description: We are looking for a person with good negotiation and contracting skills to manage the relationships on a corporate level with some of the most important Transportation environment based in Thailand.Responsibilities:Ensure the organizational principles of integrity and compliance. Draft, evaluate, negotiate and execute contracts. Establish and maintain supplier relationships by serving as a single point of contact for contractual matters.Interface with insurance companies regarding adequacy of coverage and purchasing needs.Manage record keeping for all contract-related correspondence and documentation.Provide contract-related issue resolution, both internally and externally. Monitor and complete contract close-out, variation, extension or renewal, as appropriate.Personally manage supplier relationships and have face to face negotiations for Key Products and Preferential Partner Agreements, which may include Exclusive Conditions, Deposits and Risk Contracts.Achieve the necessary terms and conditions needed on each contract to succeed in the market place, with a focus on Pricing and Availability.Represent the interests of the company on Face to Face Negotiations, Work-shops, Seminars, Travel Trade shows and Site Inspections.Qualification:Bachelor or Master Degree in Engineering or Business Management, preferably in Transportation Management filed.Strong negotiation skills, analytical, strategic & creative problem solving skills.Ability to work independently as well as within a team. Able to managing multiple projects & tight deadlines. Good image & excellent communication & interpersonal skills face to face, over email or phone.Excellent English both written and oral essential. At least 5 years’ experience in management level or project work. Strong customer services skills. Hands-on, Professional, self-motivated. Good leadership skills.

ready to take challenging assignmentsAble to coordinate with other functions and work well under massive pressureStrong negotiation SkillsPassion for Motorcycle an advantageGood attitudeFluent English language, both in written and spokenMain ResponsibilityResponsible for supporting and developing International sales and marketing, advertising and promotional activities.Takes steps to measure, enhance, and enrich the position and image of the company through various goals and objectives.Improve brand and market awareness through cooperation with appointed International dealers / markets.Develop and supports Sales through International dealers / markets.Marketing:Plan International marketing and branding objectives for your markets.Expand product solutions and offerings.Prepare marketing strategies alongside other company executives and staff.Analyze market trends and recommend changes to marketing and business development strategies based on analysis and feedback.Prepare and adhere to budgets.Create/Oversee delivery of press releases, advertisements, and other marketing materials for your markets.Ensure brand messages are consistent.Gather and analyze customer insight.Nurture and enrich all external perceptions of the company.Deepen relationships with all international distributors to ensure the most effective messaging and positioning of the organization.Take calculated risks based on data-driven analytics.Support International dealers in the development of marketing plans and activities.Intensive support of International dealers who lack internal skill or resources.Sales:Work in cooperation with other team members to determine annual unit and gross-profit plans by implementing sales strategies; analyzing trends and results.Establishes sales objectives by forecasting and developing annual sales quotas for regions and territories; projecting expected sales volume and profit for existing and new products.Implementing International sales programs by developing field sales action plans.Maintains sales volume, product mix, and selling price by keeping current with supply and demand, changing trends, economic indicators, and competitors.Establishes and monitor selling prices by monitoring costs, competition, and supply and demand.Complete all International sales operational requirements by scheduling and assigning own work; following up on work results.Intensive support and development of International distributors to achieve sales targets.Develop and maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; participating in professional societies. Identify and Develop New Market opportunities as directed.Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.Application should contain with application letter in English, Ms Word, complete resume detail of education, experiences, qualifications, current and expected salary, contact address, phone number and e-mail address attached with relevant documents and 1 recent photograph to the following detailsManpower (Thailand) - Eastern Seaboard Branch143/165 Moo 12 T. Nong-prue, A. Banglamung, Chonburi 20260Tel. 033-135-014 ext.3401 or 086-548-9494Attn: Mr. Pongwit Seeriumnuai – Sr. ConsultantPongwit.s @th.experis.comCompany website:www.manpower.th.com

job_title: Sales Executive ประจำ LAB SGS(ส่วนงาน LAB เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า)
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน- ขายงานตรวจสอบสำหรับห้องLAB พระรามสาม และ LAB เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า - สามารถขับรถได้ มีรถเป็นของตัวเองคุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร1. เพศชาย/หญิง และ จบปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ไฟฟ้า หรือ อิเลคทรอนิกส์ 2. มีประสบการณ์ในงานขาย อย่างน้อย 1 ปี3. ทำงานจันทร์ ถึง ศุกร์ เวลา 8.30 - 17.30 น.4. สามารถใช้โปรแกรมMS Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี5. ทำงานLAB SGS พระรามสาม ซอย 596. ขับรถได้ มีใบขับขี่ และ มีรถยนตร์เป็นของตนเอง

job_responsibilities: ['ResponsibilitiesHelp to expand SGS’s services to government sectorMessaging to communicate benefits of micro-mobility to various stakeholdersCreating new business leads and converting inbound inquiries into opportunities.Contacting potential clients by email/phone/social media/conferences to create opportunitiesBuilding strong rapport with clients to drive long-term relationships, including city staff, elected officials, and community groups.Building a strong department and company culture.Dedicated and driven to closing the deal and growing our company quickly and responsibly.Support the Director in tracking the regions’ progress, including managing the company’s CRM and reporting to the Director and Head of Government Partnerships. Develop content to support presentations, email campaigns, conference booths,\u200b \u200betc.This person will focus on only Government Sector.']
job_qualifications: ['s3+ years of experience in Business Development, Government Relations in a relevant industryStrong proposal writing, communication, and interpersonal skills.Experience lobbying for public policies and a highly competitive market.Ability to prioritize and maintain attention to detail.Experience navigating bureaucracy and interacting with various stakeholders.Experience in public speaking, especially in front of elected officials - for example, giving public comment at a City Council meeting.Thorough attention to detail when analyzing regulatory frameworks, and the ability to strategically lobby. ']
job_description: ResponsibilitiesHelp to expand SGS’s services to government sectorMessaging to communicate benefits of micro-mobility to various stakeholdersCreating new business leads and converting inbound inquiries into opportunities.Contacting potential clients by email/phone/social media/conferences to create opportunitiesBuilding strong rapport with clients to drive long-term relationships, including city staff, elected officials, and community groups.Building a strong department and company culture.Dedicated and driven to closing the deal and growing our company quickly and responsibly.Support the Director in tracking the regions’ progress, including managing the company’s CRM and reporting to the Director and Head of Government Partnerships. Develop content to support presentations, email campaigns, conference booths,​ ​etc.This person will focus on only Government Sector.Qualifications3+ years of experience in Business Development, Government Relations in a relevant industryStrong proposal writing, communication, and interpersonal skills.Experience lobbying for public policies and a highly competitive market.Ability to prioritize and maintain attention to detail.Experience navigating bureaucracy and interacting with various stakeholders.Experience in public speaking, especially in front of elected officials - for example, giving public comment at a City Council meeting.Thorough attention to detail when analyzing regulatory frameworks, and the ability to strategically lobby.

ResponsibilitiesCoordinate project management activities, resources, equipment and informationBreak projects into doable actions and set timeframes Liaise with clients to identify and define requirements, scope and objectivesAssign tasks to internal teams and assist with schedule management Make sure that clients’ needs are met as projects evolve Help prepare budgets Analyze risks and opportunities Oversee project procurement management Monitor project progress and handle any issues that arise Act as the point of contact and communicate project status to all participantsWork with the Project Manager to eliminate blockers Use tools to monitor working hours, plans and expenditures Issue all appropriate legal paperwork (e.g. contracts and terms of agreement)Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation, plans and reports Ensure standards and requirements are met through conducting quality assurance testsRequirementBachelor's degree in Engineer / Science / Business / Proven work experience as a Project Coordinator or similar role Experience in project management, from conception to delivery An ability to prepare and interpret flowcharts, schedules and step-by-step action plansSolid organizational skills, including multitasking and time-management Strong client-facing and teamwork skills Familiarity with risk management and quality assurance control Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Project and Microsoft Planner

job_description: Job DescriptionGiving information to clients (responding to enquiries) over the telephone about SGS services and forwarding all necessary.Carring out follow up on all enquiries to generate as many proposals as possible for training and certification activities.Carry out follow-up on all Public Training courses to ensure such courses are filled.Recording all client details and required follow-up and resultsof follow-up on the Certnet database.Coordinating clients to Sales Executive as per defined segment and marketing campaign.Effectively co-ordinate client needs and other information with all other members of the Sales team and other divisions with in SGS.Punctuality disciplined and focused in carrying out duties.Support to manage project and support Senior Sales as assignment.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in relevant discipline.0-2 years experience in administration.Good command of english,written/ spoken.Having skill in Microsoft Office (Word and Excel) and including report writing.Good personality/ Having service mind. Able to work under pressure.Interested candidate, please submit a full detail resume and must including current salary and expected salary with a recent photograph to the e-mail addressSGS (Thailand) Limited02-678-1813 ext. 1117

job_description: PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:Responsible for the Division Sales target annuallySPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES:Responsible for sales and marketing strategies, planning and sales campaign to build strong effective and productive of sales team target result and relationship with key accounts. To ensure all reports are accurate and on-time e.g. TH Breakdown, Action Plan or revised sales & marketing strategy once unachieved result has been found, Sales Momnthly Report. To drive SGS products to clients in such a way to ensure that all required team conversion rates for proposals and contracts are met and to ensure that all proposals are followed up in a manner that ensures that our services exceeds customer’s expectations.To report back to management of trends in demand for products and movements in the market including reporting on problems incurred in selling identified products.Aim at achieving sound of customer satisfaction for sale function.To handle international sales/project effectively, respond, manage, and coordinate with technical issue to service inquiry timely and accurately.To initiate idea for market events, so as to expand sales for desired zone and products.Ensure all sales team targets and contract team targets per month are achieved.QUALIFICATIONS:Bachelor degree in MechanicalEngineeringor IndustrialEngineering.0 -2 years in sales experiencesGood command of spoken and written EnglishAble to coordinate with team.Able to work independently and to coordinate several activities simultaneouslyAble to interact with all levels of management, suppliers and clientsGood communication, negotiation and interpersonal skillsActs quickly and decisively; able to make tough callsWorks well under pressure, challenges statusInterested candidate, please submit a full detail resume (by word or PDF format only) including current salary and expected salary with a recent photograph viaAPPLY NOWSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Chongnonsee Yannawa Bangkok 10120Tel. 02-678-1813 ext 1117 (K.Jidapa)

job_responsibilities: ['ResponsibilitiesHelp to expand SGS’s services to government sectorMessaging to communicate benefits of micro-mobility to various stakeholdersCreating new business leads and converting inbound inquiries into opportunities.Contacting potential clients by email/phone/social media/conferences to create opportunitiesBuilding strong rapport with clients to drive long-term relationships, including city staff, elected officials, and community groups.Building a strong department and company culture.Dedicated and driven to closing the deal and growing our company quickly and responsibly.Support the Director in tracking the regions’ progress, including managing the company’s CRM and reporting to the Director and Head of Government Partnerships. Develop content to support presentations, email campaigns, conference booths,\u200b \u200betc.This person will focus on only Government Sector.']
job_qualifications: ['s3+ years of experience in Business Development, Government Relations in a relevant industryStrong proposal writing, communication, and interpersonal skills.Experience lobbying for public policies and a highly competitive market.Ability to prioritize and maintain attention to detail.Experience navigating bureaucracy and interacting with various stakeholders.Experience in public speaking, especially in front of elected officials - for example, giving public comment at a City Council meeting.Thorough attention to detail when analyzing regulatory frameworks, and the ability to strategically lobby. ']
job_description: ResponsibilitiesHelp to expand SGS’s services to government sectorMessaging to communicate benefits of micro-mobility to various stakeholdersCreating new business leads and converting inbound inquiries into opportunities.Contacting potential clients by email/phone/social media/conferences to create opportunitiesBuilding strong rapport with clients to drive long-term relationships, including city staff, elected officials, and community groups.Building a strong department and company culture.Dedicated and driven to closing the deal and growing our company quickly and responsibly.Support the Director in tracking the regions’ progress, including managing the company’s CRM and reporting to the Director and Head of Government Partnerships. Develop content to support presentations, email campaigns, conference booths,​ ​etc.This person will focus on only Government Sector.Qualifications3+ years of experience in Business Development, Government Relations in a relevant industryStrong proposal writing, communication, and interpersonal skills.Experience lobbying for public policies and a highly competitive market.Ability to prioritize and maintain attention to detail.Experience navigating bureaucracy and interacting with various stakeholders.Experience in public speaking, especially in front of elected officials - for example, giving public comment at a City Council meeting.Thorough attention to detail when analyzing regulatory frameworks, and the ability to strategically lobby.

job_title: Sports Leader (Retail Store) at Decathlon Phuket
job_description: Sports Leader (Retail) -Fresh Graduated are WelcomeWho we wantWe are looking for sportspeople who are willing to learn throughout their lives. We want people with purpose, people who are ambitious, not only for themselves and certainly not at the expense of others, but who derive job satisfaction as well as promote the interests of the Company.We are looking for energetic people who are willing to learn and grow, have a "can do" attitude, commit to service excellence, treat people with respect, focus on results and deliver on promises with an entrepreneur spirit. A passion for the sport is a must!RESPONSIBILITIESDecide how much stock you need to cover your sales Connect with local sports users/customers to boost business Deciding which products you want to offer to your sports users/customers Set up correct pricing for the local market in Phuket for your sport Ensure that we have the right in store communication to make the customer journey smoothRecruit your future teammates Satisfy our sporty customers Ensure a high level of the layout of the products Ensure the profitability of your sport We believe in “freedom and responsibility” the chance to take decisions yourself no matter which positionAnalysis Profit and Loss of your sprot to create strategy of your business ­SKILLS PREFERREDPassion Sports One of list (Swimming , Surfing , Diving , Hiking , Trekking , Camping , Bike Sports )Vitality Responsibility Can communicate in English Entrepreneur spirit / Dare to take decision Solution-minded Hands-on / Multitask Coach mindset A Smile on your face Ready to take decisions yourself in a responsible way Experience is a plus but not mandatory Leadership mindset Our Company:Decathlon’s main mission is to make sport accessible to the many. We would like like to help, inspire and guide through your sports experiences. We believe that being active and discovering new sports every day is an important part of a healthy lifestyle.DECATHLON has been founded 1976 in Lille,France. Decathlon Thailand has launched in 2015 with our first store in Bangna. Currently we have 10 stores in Thailand, where you can get experts advice and have seamless shopping experience. We opened our Tenth Store in Phuket by the end of 2018Globally, we are present more than 50 countries and we have the ambition to open more and more new countries in order to be present everywhere we are needed.What makes us unique is that we have our own Brands. We create, design and manufacture our own products. Currently we have 20 Decathlon Brands, each dedicated to a specific sport.

job_title: Financial Leader @ DECATHLON PHUKET (Sports RETAIL): Fresh Graduates are welcome!!
job_description: Our CompanyPresent in 40 countries, brings together two different activities: producing international sports products and sport retail activity. These two areas of expertise, along with all the brands, are united behind a common purpose:sports accessible toDECATHLON, the original chain created in 1976 in France, and the other local and on-line retail formats, sell Passion brand products, made with materials provided by our production team. Thanks to our 70,000 employees, Decathlon control the whole of the product development chain: from Research & Development to the sales floor, including design, production and logistics.DECATHLON STORES ARE NOW OPENING IN THAILAND! Big Opportunity for Career developmentOur commitments as an employerDecathlon offers all staffs with opportunities for training and developing their skills. Our leaders work closely with their teams, encouraging them to make decisions and take on responsibilities.Therefore, a career in our company is always linked to your aptitudes and your enthusiasm. Today, more than ever before, our policy of internal promoting has become a major priority. At the same time, there are plenty of opportunities to move around, both within your country of origin and internationally. “Satisfied employees” is an intention that runs through all of our human resources policies. After all, we will only make our customers happy if we are happy ourselves.LOCATION : DECATHLON PHUKETBukis Phuket 89 ,Moo 5, Vichit District, Mueang Phuket83000RESPONSIBILITIESTo be financial leader of Decethlon Phuket business unitHandle and manage the business unit accounting (booking, interface integrity & accounting process control) - we are providing integration program to help you study the process.Control month-end closing, reporting, and annual auditing of the storeTake care of financial costs and incomes of the storeWork in the store and be involved in the activity of the business entity to know real issues and prioritiesWork closely with store leader to develop strategies and achieve financial goalsInteract with customersYou will be in charge of small sport sectionWork with teammates to help them develop in you area of your expertiseQUALIFICATIONSWho we want ?Responsible and self managing personPerson with purposePerson who is ambitious, not only for themselves and certainly not at the expense of others, but who drive job satisfaction as well as promote the interests of the Company.Energetic person who is willing to learn and grow, have a "can do" attitude, commit to service excellence, treat people with respect, focus on results and deliver on promises with entrepreneur spirit SKILLS PREFERREDPassion for 1 Specific sportLogical thinking and good math skillsProblem SolvingTeamworkHigh ResponsibilitiesLeadership SkillEnthusiasticEnergeticManagementEnglish -Thai Communicative JOB FUNCTIONFinancial analysisAccountingSalesProduct / Brand ManagementEXPERIENCE REQUIREDNo work experience requiredSALARYNegotiableJOB TYPEFull-time

หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ :พัฒนาและวางแผนการตลาด,ส่งเสริมการขาย และรับผิดชอบการขายภายในประเทศ ทั้ง Online และ Offlineบริหารจัดการพัฒนาโซเชียลมีเดียของบริษัท เพื่อให้เกิดการรับรู้ ให้สินค้าเป็นที่รู้จักพร้อมทั้งพัฒนาตราสินค้าศึกษาความเป็นไปได้ และพัฒนากลยุทธ์ เพื่อแนวทางการพัฒนาธุรกิจวัดและประเมินผลแผนส่งเสริมการตลาด เพื่อนำมาใช้ในการวางแผนการขาย เพื่อให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมายบริษัทวิเคราะห์คู่แข่งและแนวโน้ม ช่องทางการขายของตลาดOnline แต่ละประเภท เพื่อให้สามารถแข่งขันในตลาดได้รับผิดชอบการขายModern Trade รับผิดชอบProject ที่เกี่ยวข้อง รับมอบหมายจาก CEOงานอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องคุณสมบัติ :เพศชาย/หญิง อายุ 24-30 ปี ประสบการณ์ 1-4 ปีปริญญาตรี สาขาการตลาด , บริหาร ,การตลาดออนไลน์ , นิเทศศาสตร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีความรู้เกี่ยวกับการตลาดออนไลน์ เช่น Google Ads , Facebook Ads , Line Officialมีประสบการณ์ในการพัฒนา SEO/SEMสามารถใช้งาน Microsoft office (Excel , Word , PowerPoint) และGmail ได้คล่องสามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษในการสื่อสารและนำเสนองานได้อย่างคล่องแคล่วมีประสบการณ์ในการทำการตลาดออนไลน์และModern Tradeมีประสบการณ์ในการวางแผนกลยุทธทางการตลาด พัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ พัฒนาองค์กรอย่างน้อย 3 ปีมีความรู้เกี่ยวกับ Graphic Design จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถเขียนคอนเทนต์ Facebook และ Website เป็นภาษาอังกฤษมีประสบการณ์และมีความเข้าใจในธุรกิจอาหารจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันและเสร็จตามกำหนดสามารถทำงานต่างจังหวัดได้ มีรถยนต์และใบขับขี่จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษโปรดแนบใบรับรองการทำงานสวัสดิการเครื่องแบบประกันสังคมกองทุนเงินทดแทนโบนัส, คอมมิชชั่น งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ และของขวัญปีใหม่ประกันสุขภาพตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีHow to applyClickAPPLY NOW for submit your applicationInterested applicants are invited to applying person or send application with full resume indicating qualifications and experience, transcript, expected salary and recent photo to:  K. job_description: รายละเอียดงานสำหรับ Facebook Adminเป็นผู้ให้ความรู้ลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับสินค้าของบริษัท (เครื่องสำอางนำเข้า)ดูแลและตอบคำถามลูกค้าผ่านช่องทางแฟนเพจ Facebook, [emailprotected], Twitter, Instagram, Shopee, Lazada, ฯลฯทำรายการสั่งซื้อผ่านเว็บไซต์ให้ลูกค้าประสานงานกับทีมเพื่อจัดส่งสินค้าให้ลูกค้าจัดทำเอกสารรายงานแพคสินค้าเพื่อจัดส่งในช่วงเช้าคุณสมบัติเพศหญิง อายุไม่เกิน 27 ปี ไม่จำกัดวุฒิการศึกษามีความรับผิดชอบ รอบคอบ ซื่อสัตย์ ขยัน ใจเย็น ตั้งใจ มีทัศนคติเชิงบวก และ*มีใจรักบริการ* เป็นคนที่มีอารมณ์ดี ร่าเร่ง มีมารยาทดี มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี (พนักงานที่เฮฮาจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ)สามารถพิมพ์ภาษาไทย และภาษาอังกฤษ(ชื่อสินค้า) ได้ทั้งในคอมพิวเตอร์และมือถือ ได้คล่องแคล่วสามารถอ่านชื่อสินค้าภาษาอังกฤษได้ไม่จำเป็นต้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงาน แต่มีความกระตือรือร้น และชอบเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆสามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้ดีหากชื่นชอบการแต่งหน้าจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหากอยู่ใกล้บริษัทจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหากสามารถตอบลูกค้าเวลากลางคืน จะมีเงินพิเศษเพิ่มยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ที่มีความสามารถและมุมมองที่ดีระดับการศึกษา : มัธยมปลายหรือสูงกว่าตัวอย่างเพจwww.facebook.com/eglipsthailandwww.facebook.com/somebymithailandค่าตอบแทน / Benefitเงินเดือนเริ่มต้นที่ 10,500 - 15,000 THBประกันสังคมพักร้อน ลากิจ ลาป่วยโบนัส และปรับค่าจ้างประจำปีทริปท่องเที่ยวกับบริษัทประจำปีส่วนลดพิเศษสำหรับพนักงานในการซื้อสินค้าบริษัทสถานที่ทำงาน :บริษัท 2เอ็นเค เทรดดิ้ง จำกัด179/63 ถนนนาวงประชาพัฒนา แขวงสีกัน เขตดอนเมือง กทม. 10210วันและเวลาทำงาน วันจันทร์ - วันศุกร์ เวลา 9.00 - 18.00 น.

Responsibilities- Manage Several SME accounts to improve their performance on Application and drive revenue growth.- Monitor the performance SME Accounts, and create analytical report for accounts.- Communicate with clients to discover new growth opportunities.- Analyze performance to priority accounts (problematic or top-tier advertiser）and create optimization strategies and sell through.- Encourage SME to increase investment on Application through purchase of various advertisement products.Requirement- Excellent verbal and written native language skills, Communicational English- Bachelor's degree from an accredited institution, or must have reached college level with at least 2 years of prior work experience.- Experience in Digital marketing/Account Manager- Strong attention to detail and a proven ability to balance multiple priorities and meet deadlines.- Experience working in a fast-paced, client-facing technical service environment supporting web-based products

Currently, we are looking for an“Online Sales Executive” to join our team, who shares value in a superior experience delivered to our customers. An “Online Sales Executive” will act as a company and brand representative to provide both product and information service for the customer and liaise to handle the complaints and sudden problems.This role you will be responsible for:Sales and customer service delivery:-Work closely with the internal team to understand deeply in our basic brand story, product details, and usage. Keep updating with the team on ongoing promotional details. -Serve customers promptly by providing product and service information in assigned channels (e.g. Email, Phone call, Facebook, Instagram, Line, Lazada, Shoppee, etc.), act as a good representative to deliver a memorable experience and help them resolve happening problems.-Resolve product and service problems, be the first hand to identify the cause, suggest a solution, answer inquiries, and coordinate with other teams for help and clarification.-Provide daily online sales order, customer information, and any condition to our Stock Management team to process for the shipment.-Track and follow-up shipment status and coordinate with other teams to address and solve any delay.-Be a part of the team to achieve sales in an online channel by delivering quality service, prompt support and attractive upsell conversation.Report and documentation:-Maintain data records of customer information for the team.-Prepare Sales and Customer Service Reports by collecting transaction information, monthly sales report, customer complaint, customer feedback, and analyzing customer needs.Other tasks and responsibilities assigned by the Direct ManagerThis role requires:At least 2 years of experience in Online Sales and Customer Service functions especially on social media platforms.Knowledge in customer service and basic upselling skills.Very good communication skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing) in both Thai and English languages.Service-minded with a quality focus.Self-motivated and continuous learner.Strong analytical, planning, and problem-solving skills.Team player.Attention to detail and commitment to quality.Proficiency in Microsoft Office.If you are enthusiastic about taking up new opportunities to refresh your fire of passion in a motivated and inspired atmosphere, please get in touch!Contact information:Prestige Selection Co., Ltd.1999/18 Soi Ladprao 94 (Panjamit), Plubpla, Wangthonglang, Bangkok 10310Tel. 02-539-3209, 062-446-5699Email: Talents @ prestigeselection.co.th

Learning Experience ArchitectYou provide consultative product expertise to the sales process, direct design efforts post-sale, and own design for high-priority clients.Role descriptionSales Engineering & Discovery(Discover phases of 6Ds)o Support Account Directors throughout the sales funnel(e.g., working sessions, proposal development, pitch meetings)by establishing consultative, advisory relationships with client stakeholders.o Lead need-analysis sessions with clients to scope and uncover organizational training needs or define learning objectives within identified areas of interest. o Make product recommendations to achieve the client’s objectives, or advise on conditions and constraints for when TDA is not well suited to deliver. Design & Development(Discover, Deep Dive, Design phases of 6Ds)o Own full design process for complex or high-priority engagements, including working with subject matter expert to design curriculum for enterprise clients (based on existing curriculum or newly made) o Oversee learning outcomes of programs developed.Evaluate program successProductizationo Work with various teams to maintain, create, or expand new products for TDA portfolio, and explore new opportunities in the market.Required skillsKnowledge on digital content/topics a big plus(e.g., technology, data and analytics, digital marketing, product management, UX, cybersecurity)Customer-focused:Dedicated to meeting the expectations and requirements of internal and external customers; gets first-hand customer information and uses it for improvements in products and services; acts with customers in mind; establishes and maintains effective relationships with customers and gains their trust and respectLearning on the fly:Learns quickly when facing new problems; a relentless and versatile learner; open to change; analyzes both successes and failures for clues to improvement; experiments and will try anything to find solutions; enjoys the challenge of unfamiliar tasks; quickly grasps the essence and the underlying structure of anything.Decision-quality and problem solving:Uses analysis, wisdom, experience, and logical methods to make good decisions and solve difficult problems with effective solutions; appropriately incorporates multiple inputs to establish shared ownership and effective action.Dealing with ambiguity:Can effectively cope with change; can shift gears comfortably; can decide and act without having the total picture; isn’t upset when things are up in the air; doesn’t have to finish things before moving on; can comfortably handle risk and uncertainty.Presentation skills:is effective in a variety of formal presentation settings:one-on-one, small and large groups, with clients, peers, direct reports, and bosses; can sense the room and change tactics midstream when information isn’t being well-received or something isn’t working

job_title: International Sales and Marketing Assistant Manager
job_description: International Sales and Marketing is a dynamic and challenging position. You will interact with global leaders in the constantly changing IT field. You will learn to oversee and promote international markets for the complete line of Cheval’s products and services.Your core responsibilities will include:Market expansion by searching for and bringing in new clients.Support and develop relations with existing accounts to achieve sales targets.Identify new market opportunities and evaluate competitors strengths and weakness.Provide client support such as all communications, process requests for estimates and coordinate with Cheval internal teams as needed.Coordinate new product introduction between client and Cheval team.Develop, implement and evaluate promotional and sales activities.Improve product competitiveness and support new product development by working with Cheval Research and Development team.The suitable candidate must posses the following skills and experience.Minimum seven years experience in sales and marketing, preferably in the IT sector.Can demonstrate past performance in business development / market expansion.Managed at least 50 million Baht overall accounts, non commodities business.Working knowledge of the data center and information technology markets, ideally has experience in Electrical engineering.Developed and managed advertising and promotion programs.Bachelors degree in Marketing, Engineering or Management.Excellent negotiating and communications skills, fluency in written and spoken English.Any nationality is welcome to apply.Interested candidates with required qualification are welcome. Please send resume with related documents, salary expected and location applied to :Interested candidates with required qualification are welcome. หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ- วางแผนด้านการสื่อสารในช่องทาง social media- บริหารจัดการทีมงาน เพื่อปฏิบัติตามแผนที่วางไว้ที่ก่อให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด- บริหารจัดการทีม Online content editors เพื่อพัฒนาเนื้อหาต่างๆ ได้อย่างสร้างสรรค์ ให้เข้าถึงกลุ่มเป้าหมายที่ต้องการ- วิเคราะห์ผล Analytics ต่างๆ เพื่อที่จะสามารถทำให้งานของตัวเองนั้นดีขึ้นได้ และตอบโจทย์ที่วางไว้ในตอนต้นคุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร- อายุ 28 – 38 ปี วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป- รักในสายงานตลาดออนไลน์- มีประสบการณ์บริหารจัดการทีมงานออนไลน์อย่างน้อย 3 ปี- มีความสามารถในการบริหารจัดการ Campaign และ Timeline งานต่างๆ ได้ดีมาก- มีความเข้าใจในการกระจายตัวของเนื้อหาในช่องทาง Social media ต่างๆ (share, engagement, viral post, etc.)- มีความเป็นผู้นำสูง และสามารถตัดสินใจได้ด้วยว่าจะทำอะไร หรือไม่ควรทำอะไร- มีความกระตือรือร้นในการทำงาน- เปิดใจเรียนรู้ และพัฒนาตัวเองอยู่ตลอดเวลา- ชอบริเริ่มพัฒนาวิธีการทำงานในรูปแบบใหม่ๆ- สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้ดี

คุณสมบัติ:เพศชาย และเพศหญิงปริญญาตรี ทุกสาขาอายุ 23 - 29 ปีมีทักษะการขาย รักงานขายและงานบริการมีไหวพริบด้านการขายมีประสบการณ์ขาย 0-2 ปีมีมอเตอร์ไซต์ / รถยนต์ส่วนตัว (หากไม่มีพาหนะแต่มีประสบการณ์ขาย ยินดีพิจารณา)ประจำกรุงเทพฯลักษณะงานวางแผนการขายสินค้านำเสนอสินค้าให้กับกลุ่มลูกค้าเป้าหมายดูแลและรับผิดชอบยอดขายให้บรรลุตามเป้าหมายที่กำหนดจัดทำรายงานสรุปการขายสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน: กรุงเทพฯ: ติด BTS สนามเป้าวันและเวลาทำงาน: วันจันทร์ – ศุกร์ (หยุด เสาร์ อาทิตย์)อัตราเงินเดือน: ขึ้นอยู่กับคุณสมบัติและประสบการณ์สวัสดิการประกันสังคมคอมมิชชั่น ตามยอดขายค่าเดินทางค่าโทรศัพท์ค่ารักษาพยาบาลตามวงเงินประกันอุบัติเหตุกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพเงินช่วยเหลือค่าทำศพกรณีบิดา มารดา สามี ภรรยาและบุตรเสียชีวิตเงินช่วยเหลือกรณีคลอดบุตรสวัสดิการกู้ซื้อบ้านที่อยู่อาศัย กับธอส.Pls send your C.V. to Apply Now Or call: 0-615-0808 Ext. 0,4705Contact person: Khun Yaowarat

URGENTLY REQUIRED!!PROPOSE OF YOUR WORK:We are currently looking forBusiness Development Manager within Banking, Retail or E Commerce Industry to identify new markets, new partnerships, new ways to reach existing/new markets, or new product or service offerings to better meet the needs of existing and new markets and increase in sales volume.HOW YOU MAKE A DIFFERENCE EVERYDAY:Developing growth strategies and plansBuilds market position by locating, developing, defining, and closing business relationships.Locates or proposes potential business deals by contacting potential partners.Discovers and explores business opportunities.Researching business opportunities and viable income streamsIdentifying and mapping business strengths and customer needsIdentify opportunities for campaigns, services, and distribution channels that will lead to an increase in sales.Writing business proposalsScreens potential business deals by analyzing market strategies, deal requirements, and financials.Identify sales goals, planning, and forecasting; maintaining short- and long-term business development plans Develops negotiating strategies and positions by studying integration of new venture with company strategies and operations.Examines risks and potentials for the business opportunities.Estimates partners’ needs and goals.Closes new business deals by coordinating requirements; developing and negotiating contracts; and integrating contract requirements with business operations. Present new products and services and enhance existing relationships with client and stakeholderManaging and retaining relationships with existing clientsOther duties and responsibilities as assignedYOU’VE GOT THIS?Minimum bachelor’s degree in business, marketing or related field.Minimum 7 year experience in sales, marketing, business development or related field.Ability to manage complex projects and multi-task.Excellent organizational skills.Ability to flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive, and handle uncertainty.Creativity and an excellent comprehension in Banking, Retail or E Commerce industryNative English language both in speaking and writingINTERESTED CANDIDATES ARE INVITED TO WRITE IN WITH FULL RESUME, STATING PRESENT AND EXPECTED SALARIES, PORTFOLIO, AND SEND RESUME BY CLICK " APPLY NOW"Central Siam Public (Thailand) Co., Ltd.Italthai Tower, Floor 31, 2034 Phetchaburi Rd,Bang Kapi, Huai Khwang, Bangkok 10310

job_title: Call Center Agent (BTS Surasak) - Online Shopping (New Grads Welcome)
job_responsibilities: ['Locatoin: Jewerly Trade Center Bldg., BTS SurasakBase Salary: 16,500 - 18,000 THB/Month (depend on experiences and not include other benefit)Start working date: Monday, 18 May 2020Responsibilities:ให้บริการ ตอบคำถามลูกค้าของบริษัททางโทรศัพท์ พร้อมให้คำแนะนำเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์ต่างๆ ของทางบริษัทที่เหมาะสมกับลูกค้ารับแจ้งและดำเนินการแก้ไขปัญหาเบื้องต้นของลูกค้าที่เกิดจากการใช้บริการต่างๆ ของบริษัท พร้อมประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องติดตามพร้อมแจ้งผลการดำเนินการแก้ไขปัญหาและบริการให้ลูกค้าทราบ โทรออกเพื่อสอบถามความพึงพอใจกับลูกค้า ']
job_qualifications: ['s:การศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีเท่านั้น สามารถปฏิบัติงานเป็นกะได้ อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปี หากมีประสบการณ์ด้าน Call Center จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษผู้สมัครชายต้องพ้นภาระทางทหารแล้ว ทำงาน 5 วัน หยุด 2 วัน (หยุดไม่ตรงวันเสาร์-อาทิตย์) มี computer หรือ laptop และ internet wifi เพื่อใช้ปฏิบัติงานที่บ้านได้ หากผ่านการสัมภาษณ์จะต้องสามารถเริ่มงานได้เลยทันทีในวันจันทร์ที่ 18 พฤษภาคม ที่จะถึงนี้ค่าตอบแทน: เงินเดือนประจำ / เบี้ยขยัน / ค่า KPI / ค่ากะ / โบนัส / ประกันสุขภาพ / วันหยุดพักร้อน ']

job_responsibilities: ["To be responsible for assigned accounts (mainly in Mondern Trade) to provide customer relationship management and working with design, sales team, managers, marketing, and team members from other departments together with building strong business partnership with key account customer.ResponsibilitiesDevelop strategic business partnerships with customers to be in line with DSG's direction and customer strategy to deliver business objectives (Sales & Market Share)Create and negotiate contracts with the client and establishing a timeline of performanceTake Managing communications between key clients and internal teamsEnsure meeting all client needs and deliverables according to proposed timelinesEnsure collaborating with the sales team to maximize profit by up-selling or cross-sellingRegular analyzing client data to provide customer relationship managementCoordinate with cross functions to share/obtain customers insight for strategy planning"]

job_responsibilities: ['Role PurposeThe Program Manager will be in charge of operationalising the digital deliverables for our strategic partners.The Program Manager’s purpose will be to deepen the mutual value of PLT’s digital partnerships by supporting the Head (s) of Digital Business with the strategic deployment of innovative products, data-led initiatives, tracking the KPIs and target achievements as well as helping to grow digital capabilities inside our partner relationshipsThe Program Manager will safeguard PLT as an indisputable leader in digital innovation, by supporting the Head(s) of Digital Business carryout thought leadershipinside and outside of the organization. Key AccountabilitiesOwn the Day to Day B-Level Relationships with partnersSupport the Heads with the development, design and deployment of the core partner program deliverables.Work closely with the Digital Delivery CoE to secure the right resources are delivered in a timely fashion for the partner’s programsHelp Head(s) measure KPIs and digital frameworks through exceptional project management whilst navigating conflicting prioritiesPredict potential threats in partner day to day relationshipsSecure the efficient utilization on digital platform COE teams and resources']

job_description: Responsibilities:Providing telephone answering services for company customers and complete with advice on various products of the company that is suitable for customers.Receiving notification and taking action to solve the initial problems of customers arising from the use of various services of the company and coordinate with relevant departments.Following up and notifying the result of the problem solving and service to the customer.Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree in a related field.Ability to work in Shift (5 days per week).Male or Female, Age not more than 35 years old, New graduate is also welcome.Experiences in Customer Service or Call Center is an advantage.Good communication skill in English is a must.Male candidate has already passed the military burden.Benefits: Salary, Diligent Allowance, KPI Allowance, Group Insurance.

job_title: RETAIL MANAGER – COSMETICS / FRAGRANCE – TRAVEL RETAIL
job_responsibilities: ['Our client is a French luxury cosmetics and fragrance brand. This brand is operated by one of the world’s largest European luxury goods conglomerates. They are now seeking a Retail Manger Manager to manage their brands sales and people through their duty free (airports, downtown shopping centers) throughout Thailand.BANGKOK – LUXURY BRAND - DUTY FREE OUTLETS                               The Retail Manager will report to the Regional Manager in Singapore. He/she will be required to fulfil the following duties and responsibilities:Manage the activities at the company’s point of sales in a variety of duty free retailers located in airports and downtown shopping centers throughout Thailand.Develop sales and manage sales performance by store to reach the targetCompile monthly sales report to management, including new launches and competition analysisMotivate, evaluate and retain a dynamic sales team and build team spiritEnsure that Sales staff follow the brand’s art of selling and express Brand values through customer serviceBe the key contact of our retailer, negotiating and developing business opportunitiesEnsure the forecast of new product launches, including sellable items and testersSupervise and execute the promotional activities formulated by Marketing department']

job_description: Job Purpose1. Responsible for the study and planning of the project from the beginning of the project until the completion of it.2. Support and coordinate with various agencies within the organization so that the project assigned is successful.3. Coordinate with other external organizations to obtain the information needed to complete the project.4. Process and obtain all the documents that are necessary to use in the bidding process.5. Strengthen, develop and maintain relationships with customers and partners involved in assigned projects.Task and ResponsibilitiesStudy and research for the assigned project. • Study, research and analyze information on the potential problems, opportunities, weakness, strengths that can occur in different situations that the organization may face. Determine possible competitors, clients and the potential that each of them will affect the development of the project. • Study the technical data, information and the scope of the project to analyze the potential risks that can occur.Prepare proposals for business operations that are related to business development and strategy to create a successful project for the organization.• Compose proposals related to the business development and strategy of the project; this includes project offering concepts, presentations, project proposals and other relevant details. The proposal’s main goal is to present potential ideas to clients and/or to present opportunities to create success in the organization. Coordinate and work with internal and external organizations both locally and internationally.• Coordinate with both external and internal agencies such as business partners or any agencies related to the project in a global scale.Strengthen, develop and maintain relationships with customers and partners• Maintain and develop relationships with existing or potential customers / partners to increase the opportunity to expand the business volume of the organization.Job SpecificationEducation Background Bachelor Degree of EngineeringProfessional Experiences minimum 3 yearsComputer Software Microsoft PowerPoint , Excel , MATLAB , Siemens NX , ABAQUS CAE

job_title: Sales Representative- International Business  (หลายอัตรา)
job_description: หน้าที่รับผิดชอบประสานงานกับเจ้าหน้าที่ หัวหน้างาน ผู้บริหารและตัวแทนจำหน่ายในกลุ่มประเทศที่ได้รับมอบหมาย เพื่อเป็นตัวแทนของบริษัทในการประสานงานติดตามงานออเดอร์ขายระหว่างผู้บังคับบัญชา บริษัท โรงงาน และกับตัวแทนจำหน่าย รวมถึงหน่วยงานภายนอกเตรียมข้อมูลและเอกสารต่างๆ จัดทำเอกสารรายงานการขาย ประวัติลูกค้า รับคำร้องเรียนลูกค้า เพื่อให้บรรลุเป้าหมายการขายของหน่วยงานต่างประเทศคุณสมบัติเพศชาย หรือหญิงการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาการจัดการ,บริหารธุรกิจ การจัดการธุรกิจระหว่างประเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ในอุตสาหกรรมเครื่องปรุงรส หรืออุตสาหกรรมอาหารจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีความสามารถด้านภาษาอังกฤษ และใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้ดีต้องมีคะแนนสอบ TOIEC (> 500), TOFEL (> 450)สามารถสื่อสารภาษาจีนได้ มีคะแนนสอบ HSK ระดับ 5 ขึ้นไป หรือเคยศึกษาที่ประเทศจีนมาก่อนมีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี มีทักษะในการติดต่อสื่อสาร และมีทักษะในการประสานงานInterested candidates, please submit an application with complete resume together with a recent photograph, stating present and expected salary via APPLY NOW:Human Resources DepartmentYan Wal Yun Corporation Group Co.,Ltd.767 Wat Pai Ngoen Rd,Tung Wat Don, Sathorn Bangkok 10120 สำนักงานใหญ่ 02-674-7990-9 ต่อ 271โรงงานสมุทรสาคร034-822 200 - 2 ต่อ 910Mobile : 091-119-9095สมัครผ่าน Linkhttps://forms.gle/jDEfS3q1HWf71Rro7ID Line : hrmhowww.deksomboon.com

job_title: Sales Manager (IT products to the Government)
job_description: Job DescriptionFormulating a detailed sales plan according to given sales targets and fulfilling them.Discovering program opportunities and formulating program plan based on target markets for a major sales revenue growth.Being responsible for overdue receivable, focusing on payment collections and to decrease bad debt rates.Handling the sales network to establish stable and long term collaboration relationships with distributors to formulate and implement promotion strategies to incent secondary distributors and offering after-sales supports to regions to manage accounts and increase customers satisfaction degree. Collecting market information to analyze the local market’s needs and the competitive situation to formulate sales strategies for sales growth.Nurturing subordinates and according to business needs and market development.Utilizing roadshow releases, product promotion exhibitions, distributor conferences, etc., with counterparts to improve revenue growth.RequirementsBachelor's Degree or above,Age above 35-48 years. Good in Thai & English, both written and spoken. Has experience in selling IT products to the government for over 8 years. Has a connection with the government. Has own car. Ability to travel around the Bangkok Metropolitan Regionarea. Have good motivation & persuasion and strong analytical skills.

job_title: Customer and Tech support for Fluent Japanese speaker
job_description: We are a funded startup which is revolutionizing online payments. We are seeking a polished and motivated team member to provide customer service to our customers in Japan, using a combination of online tools and, if necessary, phone.You should be fully fluent in written and spoken Japanese and also speak English, we experience in customer and basic technical support. Ideally you would be familiar with Intercom, Slack, Zoom, Google docs and other tools. You will liaise between customers, our development team, and our business operations team in Bangkok.Salary DOE

job_responsibilities: ['Position :IT Sales ExecutiveKey Responsibility :To sell SGS products to clients in such a way to ensure that all required conversion rates for proposals and contracts are met and to ensure that all proposals are followed up in a manner that ensures that SGS-SSC exceeds customer’s expectations. To report back to management of trends in demand for products and movements in the market including reporting on problems incurred in selling identified products.Aim at achieving sound of customer satisfaction for sale function.To coach up CSO team to ensure that the sales targets of are met.To handle international sales effectively, respond to service inquiry timely and accurately.To initiate idea for market events, so as to expand sales for desired zone and SSC products.Carry out effective sales planning in allocated location to ensure client visit targets are met. Records of weekly sales plans are to be to be maintained.Ensure all Monthly reports are accurate and on-time, e.g. Sales Monthly Report and TH Breakdown.Ensure all sales targets and contract targets per month are achievedConducting sales presentations to clients on SGS Products and services and record results of all client visits.Preparation of proposals (where necessary), follow-up on all proposals and recording of the results of such.Monitor proposals and contract conversion rates with the aim of achieving targets.Conduct all price negotiation with in set limits and ensure as many as possible contracts are taken.Update all information on CertNET (Certification Management System).Conduct work as per relevant SGS-SSC procedures.Plan and Execute action of Key account management for Key client and key consultant.Provide coaching to Sales Staff i.e. sales process, sales database and selling techniques etc.Responding and sale for international inquiries, i.e. proposal & contracting, project planning and coordinate for technical issues.Identify cold call list, potential SSC market in zone and industrial sector or specific product and reporting to Manager.Promote key account clients business relation by conducting call & visits regularly for the assigned Key Accounts.Ensure the effectively manage marketing project and selling project.To control Sales Materials are up to date and have sufficient amount in stock.Authorize to sign Contracts with clients on behalf of SGS (Thailand) Limited according to SGS Price Structure.']
job_qualifications: [":Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Business Computer.3 years proven experience in IT project selling. The ISO certification/project is an advantage.Excellent telephone manner including proven communication / interpersonal skillsHighly developed public speaking skillsProven team player and ability to work with very little supervisionLogical approach to problem solvingGood organizational skills including report writingGood command in English in both of speaking and writing.Passed Internal Auditor course ISO 27001 course or other IT management system training course.National Higher Certificate or equivalent in relevant discipline.Human Resources DepartmentSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Road Chongnonsee YannawaBangkok 10120 ThailandTel : +66 (0)2 678 18 13 Ext 1117Fax : +66 (0)2 678 1541 "]
job_description: Position :IT Sales ExecutiveKey Responsibility :To sell SGS products to clients in such a way to ensure that all required conversion rates for proposals and contracts are met and to ensure that all proposals are followed up in a manner that ensures that SGS-SSC exceeds customer’s expectations. To report back to management of trends in demand for products and movements in the market including reporting on problems incurred in selling identified products.Aim at achieving sound of customer satisfaction for sale function.To coach up CSO team to ensure that the sales targets of are met.To handle international sales effectively, respond to service inquiry timely and accurately.To initiate idea for market events, so as to expand sales for desired zone and SSC products.Carry out effective sales planning in allocated location to ensure client visit targets are met. Records of weekly sales plans are to be to be maintained.Ensure all Monthly reports are accurate and on-time, e.g. Sales Monthly Report and TH Breakdown.Ensure all sales targets and contract targets per month are achievedConducting sales presentations to clients on SGS Products and services and record results of all client visits.Preparation of proposals (where necessary), follow-up on all proposals and recording of the results of such.Monitor proposals and contract conversion rates with the aim of achieving targets.Conduct all price negotiation with in set limits and ensure as many as possible contracts are taken.Update all information on CertNET (Certification Management System).Conduct work as per relevant SGS-SSC procedures.Plan and Execute action of Key account management for Key client and key consultant.Provide coaching to Sales Staff i.e. sales process, sales database and selling techniques etc.Responding and sale for international inquiries, i.e. proposal & contracting, project planning and coordinate for technical issues.Identify cold call list, potential SSC market in zone and industrial sector or specific product and reporting to Manager.Promote key account clients business relation by conducting call & visits regularly for the assigned Key Accounts.Ensure the effectively manage marketing project and selling project.To control Sales Materials are up to date and have sufficient amount in stock.Authorize to sign Contracts with clients on behalf of SGS (Thailand) Limited according to SGS Price Structure.Qualification:Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Business Computer.3 years proven experience in IT project selling. The ISO certification/project is an advantage.Excellent telephone manner including proven communication / interpersonal skillsHighly developed public speaking skillsProven team player and ability to work with very little supervisionLogical approach to problem solvingGood organizational skills including report writingGood command in English in both of speaking and writing.Passed Internal Auditor course ISO 27001 course or other IT management system training course.National Higher Certificate or equivalent in relevant discipline.Human Resources DepartmentSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Road Chongnonsee YannawaBangkok 10120 ThailandTel : +66 (0)2 678 18 13 Ext 1117Fax : +66 (0)2 678 1541

job_title: Sales Executive ประจำ LAB SGS(ส่วนงาน LAB เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า)
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน- ขายงานตรวจสอบสำหรับห้องLAB พระรามสาม และ LAB เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า - สามารถขับรถได้ มีรถเป็นของตัวเองคุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร1. เพศชาย/หญิง และ จบปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ไฟฟ้า หรือ อิเลคทรอนิกส์ 2. มีประสบการณ์ในงานขาย อย่างน้อย 1 ปี3. ทำงานจันทร์ ถึง ศุกร์ เวลา 8.30 - 17.30 น.4. สามารถใช้โปรแกรมMS Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี5. ทำงานLAB SGS พระรามสาม ซอย 596. ขับรถได้ มีใบขับขี่ และ มีรถยนตร์เป็นของตนเอง

job_responsibilities: ['Job Duties:Identify business opportunities by identifying prospects, evaluating and researching their company and analyzing their existing web presence.Build new and existing networks and leverage those networks in order to prospect and nurture opportunities that lead to sales.Identify product improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends, market activities, and competitors.Prepare weekly sales reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and activity.Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.Skills and ']

job_description: Job Duties:Identify business opportunities by identifying prospects, evaluating and researching their company and analyzing their existing web presence.Build new and existing networks and leverage those networks in order to prospect and nurture opportunities that lead to sales.Identify product improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends, market activities, and competitors.Prepare weekly sales reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and activity.Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.Skills and Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing or related fields.Prior sale experience required about 2 years.Ability to communication of English is preferable.Computer literate is required.Have own car with driving's license.
